mapper.select: select rno,pid,psfile,pname,category_id,category_nm,brand,quantity,price,delivery_price,regdate,updatedate from(select rownum rno,pid,psfile,pname,category_id,category_nm,brand,quantity,price,delivery_price,regdate,updatedate from(select p.pid,p.pname,p.category_id,c.category_nm,p.price,p.regdate,p.quantity,p.updatedate,p.delivery_price,p.brand,psfile from myshop_product p,myshop_category c where p.category_id = c.category_id order by regdate desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}
select category_id,category_nm from myshop_category where dept_level = 1
select category_id,category_nm from myshop_category where category_parent = #{cateCode}
select * from myshop_category where category_id > 10000 and category_id < 20000
select * from myshop_category where category_id > 20000 and category_id < 30000
select * from myshop_category where category_id > 30000 and category_id < 40000
select * from myshop_category where category_id > 40000 and category_id < 50000
